53 enum SpellPartialResist
54 {
55  SPELL_PARTIAL_RESIST_NONE = 0, // 0%, full hit
56  SPELL_PARTIAL_RESIST_PCT_25, // 25%
57  SPELL_PARTIAL_RESIST_PCT_50, // 50%
58  SPELL_PARTIAL_RESIST_PCT_75, // 75%
59  SPELL_PARTIAL_RESIST_PCT_100, // 100%, full resist
60 };
61 
62 #define NUM_SPELL_PARTIAL_RESISTS 5
63 
64 #define BASE_MELEERANGE_OFFSET 1.33f
65 #define BASE_MINDAMAGE 1.0f
66 #define BASE_MAXDAMAGE 2.0f
67 #define BASE_ATTACK_TIME 2000
68 
69 enum UnitBytes0Offsets : uint8
70 {
71  UNIT_BYTES_0_OFFSET_RACE = 0,
72  UNIT_BYTES_0_OFFSET_CLASS = 1,
73  UNIT_BYTES_0_OFFSET_GENDER = 2,
74  UNIT_BYTES_0_OFFSET_POWER_TYPE = 3,
75 };
76 
77 enum UnitBytes1Offsets : uint8
78 {
79  UNIT_BYTES_1_OFFSET_STAND_STATE = 0,
80  UNIT_BYTES_1_OFFSET_PET_LOYALTY = 1,
81  UNIT_BYTES_1_OFFSET_VIS_FLAGS = 2,
82  UNIT_BYTES_1_OFFSET_MISC_FLAGS = 3,
83 };
84 
85 enum UnitBytes2Offsets : uint8
86 {
87  UNIT_BYTES_2_OFFSET_SHEATH_STATE = 0,
88  UNIT_BYTES_2_OFFSET_DEBUFF_LIMIT = 1,
89  UNIT_BYTES_2_OFFSET_PET_FLAGS = 2,
90  UNIT_BYTES_2_OFFSET_SHAPESHIFT = 3,
91 };
92 
93 // byte value (UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1, UNIT_BYTES_1_OFFSET_STAND_STATE)
94 enum UnitStandStateType
95 {
96  UNIT_STAND_STATE_STAND = 0,
97  UNIT_STAND_STATE_SIT = 1,
98  UNIT_STAND_STATE_SIT_CHAIR = 2,
99  UNIT_STAND_STATE_SLEEP = 3,
100  UNIT_STAND_STATE_SIT_LOW_CHAIR = 4,
101  UNIT_STAND_STATE_SIT_MEDIUM_CHAIR = 5,
102  UNIT_STAND_STATE_SIT_HIGH_CHAIR = 6,
103  UNIT_STAND_STATE_DEAD = 7,
104  UNIT_STAND_STATE_KNEEL = 8,
105  UNIT_STAND_STATE_CUSTOM = 9 // Depends on model animation. Submerge, freeze, hide, hibernate, rest
106 };
107 
108 #define MAX_UNIT_STAND_STATE 10
109 
110 // byte flags value (UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1,UNIT_BYTES_1_OFFSET_PET_LOYALTY)
111 // This corresponds to free talent points (pet case)
112 
113 // byte flags value (UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1,2)
114 enum UnitVisFlags
115 {
116  UNIT_VIS_FLAG_GHOST = 0x01,
117  UNIT_VIS_FLAG_CREEP = 0x02,
118  UNIT_VIS_FLAG_UNTRACKABLE = 0x04,
119  UNIT_VIS_FLAG_UNK4 = 0x08,
120  UNIT_VIS_FLAG_UNK5 = 0x10,
121  UNIT_VIS_FLAGS_ALL = 0xFF
122 };
123 
124 // byte flags value (UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1,3)
125 // These flags seem to be related to visibility
126 // In wotlk+ they are moved to UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1,2
127 enum UnitMiscFlags
128 {
129  UNIT_BYTE1_FLAG_ALWAYS_STAND = 0x01,
130  UNIT_BYTE1_FLAG_FLY_ANIM = 0x02, // Creature that can fly and are not on the ground appear to have this flag. If they are on the ground, flag is not present.
131  UNIT_BYTE1_FLAG_ALL = 0xFF
132 };
133 
134 // byte value (UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2,UNIT_BYTES_2_OFFSET_SHEATH_STATE)
135 enum SheathState
136 {
137  SHEATH_STATE_UNARMED = 0, // non prepared weapon
138  SHEATH_STATE_MELEE = 1, // prepared melee weapon
139  SHEATH_STATE_RANGED = 2 // prepared ranged weapon
140 };
141 
142 #define MAX_SHEATH_STATE 3
143 
144 // byte flags value (UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2,1)
145 enum UnitBytes2_Flags
146 {
147  UNIT_BYTE2_CREATURE_DEBUFF_LIMIT = 16,
148  UNIT_BYTE2_PLAYER_CONTROLLED_DEBUFF_LIMIT = 40,
149 };
150 
151 // byte flags value (UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2,2)
152 enum UnitRename
153 {
154  UNIT_CAN_BE_RENAMED = 0x01,
155  UNIT_CAN_BE_ABANDONED = 0x02,
156 };

166  TWOHANDEDSWING = 2

169 enum VictimState
170 {
171  VICTIMSTATE_UNAFFECTED = 0, // seen in relation with HITINFO_MISS
172  VICTIMSTATE_NORMAL = 1,
173  VICTIMSTATE_DODGE = 2,
174  VICTIMSTATE_PARRY = 3,
175  VICTIMSTATE_INTERRUPT = 4,
176  VICTIMSTATE_BLOCKS = 5,
177  VICTIMSTATE_EVADES = 6,
178  VICTIMSTATE_IS_IMMUNE = 7,
179  VICTIMSTATE_DEFLECTS = 8
180 };
181 
182 enum HitInfo
183 {
184  HITINFO_NORMALSWING = 0x00000000,
185  HITINFO_UNK0 = 0x00000001, // req correct packet structure
186  HITINFO_NORMALSWING2 = 0x00000002,
187  HITINFO_LEFTSWING = 0x00000004,
188  HITINFO_UNK3 = 0x00000008,
189  HITINFO_MISS = 0x00000010,
190  HITINFO_ABSORB = 0x00000020, // plays absorb sound
191  HITINFO_RESIST = 0x00000040, // resisted atleast some damage
192  HITINFO_CRITICALHIT = 0x00000080,
193  HITINFO_UNK8 = 0x00000100, // wotlk?
194  HITINFO_BLOCK = 0x00000800,
195  HITINFO_UNK9 = 0x00002000, // wotlk?
196  HITINFO_GLANCING = 0x00004000,
197  HITINFO_CRUSHING = 0x00008000,
198  HITINFO_NOACTION = 0x00010000,
199  HITINFO_SWINGNOHITSOUND = 0x00080000
200 };

228 enum UnitModifierType
229 {
230  BASE_VALUE = 0,
231  BASE_PCT = 1,
232  TOTAL_VALUE = 2,
233  TOTAL_PCT = 3,
234  MODIFIER_TYPE_END = 4

244 {
245  RESISTANCE,
246  DAMAGE_DEALT,

249 
250 enum AuraRemoveMode
251 {
252  AURA_REMOVE_BY_DEFAULT,
253  AURA_REMOVE_BY_STACK, // at replace by similar aura
254  AURA_REMOVE_BY_CANCEL,
255  AURA_REMOVE_BY_DISPEL,
256  AURA_REMOVE_BY_DEATH,
257  AURA_REMOVE_BY_DELETE, // use for speedup and prevent unexpected effects at player logout/pet unsummon (must be used _only_ after save), delete.
258  AURA_REMOVE_BY_SHIELD_BREAK, // when absorb shield is removed by damage
259  AURA_REMOVE_BY_EXPIRE, // at duration end
260  AURA_REMOVE_BY_TRACKING, // aura is removed because of a conflicting tracked aura
261  AURA_REMOVE_BY_GAINED_STACK // gained stack
262 };
263 
264 enum AuraScriptLocation : uint32
265 {
266  SCRIPT_LOCATION_MELEE_DAMAGE_DONE,
267  SCRIPT_LOCATION_MELEE_DAMAGE_TAKEN,
268  SCRIPT_LOCATION_SPELL_DAMAGE_DONE,
269  SCRIPT_LOCATION_SPELL_DAMAGE_TAKEN,
270  SCRIPT_LOCATION_SPELL_HEALING_DONE,
271  SCRIPT_LOCATION_SPELL_HEALING_TAKEN,
272  SCRIPT_LOCATION_MAX,
273 };
274 
275 enum UnitMods
276 {
277  UNIT_MOD_STAT_STRENGTH, // UNIT_MOD_STAT_STRENGTH..UNIT_MOD_STAT_SPIRIT must be in existing order, it's accessed by index values of Stats enum.
278  UNIT_MOD_STAT_AGILITY,
279  UNIT_MOD_STAT_STAMINA,
280  UNIT_MOD_STAT_INTELLECT,
281  UNIT_MOD_STAT_SPIRIT,
282  UNIT_MOD_HEALTH,
283  UNIT_MOD_MANA, // UNIT_MOD_MANA..UNIT_MOD_HAPPINESS must be in existing order, it's accessed by index values of Powers enum.
284  UNIT_MOD_RAGE,
285  UNIT_MOD_FOCUS,
286  UNIT_MOD_ENERGY,
287  UNIT_MOD_HAPPINESS,
288  UNIT_MOD_ARMOR, // UNIT_MOD_ARMOR..UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_ARCANE must be in existing order, it's accessed by index values of SpellSchools enum.
289  UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_HOLY,
290  UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_FIRE,
291  UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_NATURE,
292  UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_FROST,
293  UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_SHADOW,
294  UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_ARCANE,
295  UNIT_MOD_ATTACK_POWER,
296  UNIT_MOD_ATTACK_POWER_RANGED,
297  UNIT_MOD_DAMAGE_MAINHAND,
298  UNIT_MOD_DAMAGE_OFFHAND,
299  UNIT_MOD_DAMAGE_RANGED,
300  UNIT_MOD_END,
301  // synonyms
302  UNIT_MOD_STAT_START = UNIT_MOD_STAT_STRENGTH,
303  UNIT_MOD_STAT_END = UNIT_MOD_STAT_SPIRIT + 1,
304  UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_START = UNIT_MOD_ARMOR,
305  UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_END = UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_ARCANE + 1,
306  UNIT_MOD_POWER_START = UNIT_MOD_MANA,
307  UNIT_MOD_POWER_END = UNIT_MOD_HAPPINESS + 1
308 };
309 
310 enum BaseModGroup
311 {
312  CRIT_PERCENTAGE,
313  RANGED_CRIT_PERCENTAGE,
314  OFFHAND_CRIT_PERCENTAGE,
315  SHIELD_BLOCK_VALUE,
316  BASEMOD_END
317 };
318 
319 enum BaseModType
320 {
321  FLAT_MOD,
322  PCT_MOD,
323  MOD_END
324 };
325 
326 enum DeathState
327 {
328  ALIVE = 0, // show as alive
329  JUST_DIED = 1, // temporary state at die, for creature auto converted to CORPSE, for player at next update call
330  CORPSE = 2, // corpse state, for player this also meaning that player not leave corpse
331  DEAD = 3, // for creature despawned state (corpse despawned), for player CORPSE/DEAD not clear way switches (FIXME), and use m_deathtimer > 0 check for real corpse state
332  JUST_ALIVED = 4, // temporary state at resurrection, for creature auto converted to ALIVE, for player at next update call
333 };
334 
335 // internal state flags for some auras and movement generators, other.
336 enum UnitState
337 {
338  // persistent state (applied by aura/etc until expire)
339  UNIT_STAT_MELEE_ATTACKING = 0x00000001, // unit is melee attacking someone Unit::Attack
340  UNIT_STAT_LOGOUT_TIMER = 0x00000002, // Unit is logging out
341  UNIT_STAT_FEIGN_DEATH = 0x00000004, // Unit::SetFeignDeath - a successful feign death is currently active
342  UNIT_STAT_STUNNED = 0x00000008, // Aura::HandleAuraModStun
343  UNIT_STAT_ROOT = 0x00000010, // Aura::HandleAuraModRoot
344  UNIT_STAT_ISOLATED = 0x00000020, // area auras do not affect other players, Aura::HandleAuraModSchoolImmunity
345  UNIT_STAT_POSSESSED = 0x00000040, // Aura::HandleAuraModPossess (duplicates UNIT_FLAG_POSSESSED)
346 
347  // movement generators begin:
348  UNIT_STAT_TAXI_FLIGHT = 0x00000080, // TaxiMovementGenerator on stack
349  UNIT_STAT_PROPELLED = 0x00000100, // EffectMovementGenerator on stack
350  UNIT_STAT_PANIC = 0x00000200, // PanicMovementGenerator on stack
351  UNIT_STAT_RETREATING = 0x00000400, // RetreatMovementGenerator on stack
352  UNIT_STAT_DISTRACTED = 0x00000800, // DistractedMovementGenerator on stack
353  UNIT_STAT_STAY = 0x00001000, // StayMovementGenerator on stack
354  UNIT_STAT_CONFUSED = 0x00002000, // ConfusedMovementGenerator on stack
355  UNIT_STAT_CONFUSED_MOVE = 0x00004000, // ^ - spline dispatched
356  UNIT_STAT_ROAMING = 0x00008000, // Point/Retreat/Stay/Wander/Waypoint/Effect MovementGenerator on stack
357  UNIT_STAT_ROAMING_MOVE = 0x00010000, // ^ - spline dispatched
358  UNIT_STAT_CHASE = 0x00020000, // ChaseMovementGenerator on stack
359  UNIT_STAT_CHASE_MOVE = 0x00040000, // ^ - spline dispatched
360  UNIT_STAT_FOLLOW = 0x00080000, // FollowMovementGenerator on stack
361  UNIT_STAT_FOLLOW_MOVE = 0x00100000, // ^ - spline dispatched
362  UNIT_STAT_FLEEING = 0x00200000, // FleeingMovementGenerator/PanicMovementGenerator on stack
363  UNIT_STAT_FLEEING_MOVE = 0x00400000, // ^ - spline dispatched
364  // movemement generators end
365 
366  UNIT_STAT_CHANNELING = 0x00800000,
367 
368  // High-Level states (usually only with Creatures)
369  UNIT_STAT_NO_COMBAT_MOVEMENT = 0x01000000, // Combat Movement for MoveChase stopped
370  UNIT_STAT_NO_FOLLOW_MOVEMENT = 0x02000000,
371  UNIT_STAT_RUNNING = 0x04000000, // SetRun for waypoints and such
372  UNIT_STAT_WAYPOINT_PAUSED = 0x08000000, // Waypoint-Movement paused genericly (ie by script)
373 
374  UNIT_STAT_IGNORE_PATHFINDING = 0x10000000, // do not use pathfinding in any MovementGenerator
375  UNIT_STAT_AI_ROOT = 0x20000000, // root but from AI script
376 
377  // masks (only for check)
378 
379  // can't move currently
380  UNIT_STAT_CAN_NOT_MOVE = UNIT_STAT_ROOT | UNIT_STAT_STUNNED | UNIT_STAT_LOGOUT_TIMER | UNIT_STAT_FEIGN_DEATH | UNIT_STAT_AI_ROOT,
381 
382  // stay by different reasons
383  UNIT_STAT_NOT_MOVE = UNIT_STAT_ROOT | UNIT_STAT_STUNNED | UNIT_STAT_LOGOUT_TIMER | UNIT_STAT_FEIGN_DEATH |
384  UNIT_STAT_DISTRACTED | UNIT_STAT_AI_ROOT,
385 
386  // stay or scripted movement for effect( = in player case you can't move by client command)
387  UNIT_STAT_NO_FREE_MOVE = UNIT_STAT_ROOT | UNIT_STAT_STUNNED | UNIT_STAT_LOGOUT_TIMER | UNIT_STAT_FEIGN_DEATH |
388  UNIT_STAT_TAXI_FLIGHT |
389  UNIT_STAT_CONFUSED | UNIT_STAT_FLEEING | UNIT_STAT_PROPELLED | UNIT_STAT_AI_ROOT,
390 
391  // not react at move in sight or other
392  UNIT_STAT_CAN_NOT_REACT = UNIT_STAT_STUNNED | UNIT_STAT_LOGOUT_TIMER | UNIT_STAT_FEIGN_DEATH |
393  UNIT_STAT_CONFUSED | UNIT_STAT_FLEEING | UNIT_STAT_RETREATING,
394 
395  // AI disabled by some reason
396  UNIT_STAT_LOST_CONTROL = UNIT_STAT_CONFUSED | UNIT_STAT_FLEEING | UNIT_STAT_POSSESSED,
397 
398  // above 2 state cases
399  UNIT_STAT_CAN_NOT_REACT_OR_LOST_CONTROL = UNIT_STAT_CAN_NOT_REACT | UNIT_STAT_LOST_CONTROL,
400 
401  // masks (for check or reset)
402 
403  // for real move using movegen check and stop (except unstoppable flight)
404  UNIT_STAT_MOVING = UNIT_STAT_ROAMING_MOVE | UNIT_STAT_CHASE_MOVE | UNIT_STAT_FOLLOW_MOVE | UNIT_STAT_FLEEING_MOVE,
405 
406  UNIT_STAT_RUNNING_STATE = UNIT_STAT_CHASE_MOVE | UNIT_STAT_FLEEING_MOVE | UNIT_STAT_RUNNING,
407 
408  UNIT_STAT_ALL_STATE = 0xFFFFFFFF,
409  UNIT_STAT_ALL_DYN_STATES = UNIT_STAT_ALL_STATE & ~(UNIT_STAT_NO_COMBAT_MOVEMENT | UNIT_STAT_RUNNING | UNIT_STAT_WAYPOINT_PAUSED | UNIT_STAT_IGNORE_PATHFINDING),
410 };
411 
412 #define BASE_CHARGE_SPEED 27.0f
413 
414 typedef const Opcodes SpeedOpcodePair[3];
415 SpeedOpcodePair SetSpeed2Opc_table[MAX_MOVE_TYPE] =
416 {
417  {SMSG_FORCE_WALK_SPEED_CHANGE, SMSG_SPLINE_SET_WALK_SPEED, MSG_MOVE_SET_WALK_SPEED},
418  {SMSG_FORCE_RUN_SPEED_CHANGE, SMSG_SPLINE_SET_RUN_SPEED, MSG_MOVE_SET_RUN_SPEED},
419  {SMSG_FORCE_RUN_BACK_SPEED_CHANGE, SMSG_SPLINE_SET_RUN_BACK_SPEED, MSG_MOVE_SET_RUN_BACK_SPEED},
420  {SMSG_FORCE_SWIM_SPEED_CHANGE, SMSG_SPLINE_SET_SWIM_SPEED, MSG_MOVE_SET_SWIM_SPEED},
421  {SMSG_FORCE_SWIM_BACK_SPEED_CHANGE, SMSG_SPLINE_SET_SWIM_BACK_SPEED, MSG_MOVE_SET_SWIM_BACK_SPEED},
422  {SMSG_FORCE_TURN_RATE_CHANGE, SMSG_SPLINE_SET_TURN_RATE, MSG_MOVE_SET_TURN_RATE},
423  {SMSG_FORCE_FLIGHT_SPEED_CHANGE, SMSG_SPLINE_SET_FLIGHT_SPEED, MSG_MOVE_SET_FLIGHT_SPEED},
424  {SMSG_FORCE_FLIGHT_BACK_SPEED_CHANGE, SMSG_SPLINE_SET_FLIGHT_BACK_SPEED, MSG_MOVE_SET_FLIGHT_BACK_SPEED},
425 };

427 enum CombatRating
428 {
429  CR_WEAPON_SKILL = 0,
430  CR_DEFENSE_SKILL = 1,
431  CR_DODGE = 2,
432  CR_PARRY = 3,
433  CR_BLOCK = 4,
434  CR_HIT_MELEE = 5,
435  CR_HIT_RANGED = 6,
436  CR_HIT_SPELL = 7,
437  CR_CRIT_MELEE = 8,
438  CR_CRIT_RANGED = 9,
439  CR_CRIT_SPELL = 10,
440  CR_HIT_TAKEN_MELEE = 11,
441  CR_HIT_TAKEN_RANGED = 12,
442  CR_HIT_TAKEN_SPELL = 13,
443  CR_CRIT_TAKEN_MELEE = 14,
444  CR_CRIT_TAKEN_RANGED = 15,
445  CR_CRIT_TAKEN_SPELL = 16,
446  CR_HASTE_MELEE = 17,
447  CR_HASTE_RANGED = 18,
448  CR_HASTE_SPELL = 19,
449  CR_WEAPON_SKILL_MAINHAND = 20,
450  CR_WEAPON_SKILL_OFFHAND = 21,
451  CR_WEAPON_SKILL_RANGED = 22,
452  CR_EXPERTISE = 23
453 };

455 #define MAX_COMBAT_RATING 24
456 
458 enum UnitAuraFlags
459 {
460  UNIT_AURAFLAG_ALIVE_INVISIBLE = 0x1, // aura which makes unit invisible for alive
461 };
462 
463 enum UnitVisibility
464 {
465  VISIBILITY_OFF = 0, // absolute, not detectable, GM-like, can see all other
466  VISIBILITY_ON = 1,
467  VISIBILITY_GROUP_STEALTH = 2, // detect chance, seen and can see group members
468  VISIBILITY_GROUP_INVISIBILITY = 3, // invisibility, can see and can be seen only another invisible unit or invisible detection unit, set only if not stealthed, and in checks not used (mask used instead)
469  VISIBILITY_GROUP_NO_DETECT = 4, // state just at stealth apply for update Grid state. Don't remove, otherwise stealth spells will break
470  VISIBILITY_REMOVE_CORPSE = 5 // special totally not detectable visibility for force delete object while removing a corpse
471 };
472 
473 // Value masks for UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS
474 enum UnitFlags
475 {
476  UNIT_FLAG_UNK_0 = 0x00000001, // Movement checks disabled, likely paired with loss of client control packet. We use it to add custom cliffwalking to GM mode until actual usecases will be known.
477  UNIT_FLAG_SPAWNING = 0x00000002, // Spawning in - other uses are wrong
478  UNIT_FLAG_CLIENT_CONTROL_LOST = 0x00000004, // Generic unspecified loss of control initiated by server script, movement checks disabled, paired with loss of client control packet.
479  UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED = 0x00000008, // players, pets, totems, guardians, companions, charms, any units associated with players
480  UNIT_FLAG_RENAME = 0x00000010,
481  UNIT_FLAG_PREPARATION = 0x00000020, // don't take reagents for spells with SPELL_ATTR_EX5_NO_REAGENT_WHILE_PREP
482  UNIT_FLAG_UNK_6 = 0x00000040,
483  UNIT_FLAG_NOT_ATTACKABLE_1 = 0x00000080, // ?? (UNIT_FLAG_PVP_ATTACKABLE | UNIT_FLAG_NOT_ATTACKABLE_1) is NON_PVP_ATTACKABLE
484  UNIT_FLAG_IMMUNE_TO_PLAYER = 0x00000100, // Target is immune to players
485  UNIT_FLAG_IMMUNE_TO_NPC = 0x00000200, // Target is immune to Non-Player Characters
486  UNIT_FLAG_LOOTING = 0x00000400, // loot animation
487  UNIT_FLAG_PET_IN_COMBAT = 0x00000800, // in combat?, 2.0.8
488  UNIT_FLAG_PVP = 0x00001000,
489  UNIT_FLAG_SILENCED = 0x00002000, // silenced, 2.1.1
490  UNIT_FLAG_PERSUADED = 0x00004000, // persuaded, 2.0.8
491  UNIT_FLAG_SWIMMING = 0x00008000, // controls water swimming animation - TODO: confirm whether dynamic or static
492  UNIT_FLAG_UNTARGETABLE = 0x00010000, // is not targetable by attack or spell
493  UNIT_FLAG_PACIFIED = 0x00020000,
494  UNIT_FLAG_STUNNED = 0x00040000, // Unit is a subject to stun, turn and strafe movement disabled
495  UNIT_FLAG_IN_COMBAT = 0x00080000,
496  UNIT_FLAG_TAXI_FLIGHT = 0x00100000, // Unit is on taxi, paired with a duplicate loss of client control packet (likely a legacy serverside hack). Disables any spellcasts not allowed in taxi flight client-side.
497  UNIT_FLAG_DISARMED = 0x00200000, // disable melee spells casting..., "Required melee weapon" added to melee spells tooltip.
498  UNIT_FLAG_CONFUSED = 0x00400000, // Unit is a subject to confused movement, movement checks disabled, paired with loss of client control packet.
499  UNIT_FLAG_FLEEING = 0x00800000, // Unit is a subject to fleeing movement, movement checks disabled, paired with loss of client control packet.
500  UNIT_FLAG_POSSESSED = 0x01000000, // Unit is under remote control by another unit, movement checks disabled, paired with loss of client control packet. New master is allowed to use melee attack and can't select this unit via mouse in the world (as if it was own character).
501  UNIT_FLAG_UNINTERACTIBLE = 0x02000000,
502  UNIT_FLAG_SKINNABLE = 0x04000000,
503  UNIT_FLAG_MOUNT = 0x08000000,
504  UNIT_FLAG_UNK_28 = 0x10000000,
505  UNIT_FLAG_PREVENT_ANIM = 0x20000000, // used in Feing Death spell
506  UNIT_FLAG_SHEATHE = 0x40000000,
507  UNIT_FLAG_IMMUNE = 0x80000000
508 };
509 
510 // Value masks for UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS_2
511 enum UnitFlags2
512 {
513  UNIT_FLAG2_FEIGN_DEATH = 0x00000001,
514  UNIT_FLAG2_HIDE_BODY = 0x00000002, // Hides body and body armor. Weapons and shoulder and head armor still visible
515  UNIT_FLAG2_IGNORE_REPUTATION = 0x00000004,
516  UNIT_FLAG2_COMPREHEND_LANG = 0x00000008,
517  UNIT_FLAG2_CLONED = 0x00000010, // Used in SPELL_AURA_MIRROR_IMAGE
518  UNIT_FLAG2_DO_NOT_FADE_IN = 0x00000020,
519  UNIT_FLAG2_FORCE_MOVE = 0x00000040,
520  // UNIT_FLAG2_DISARM_OFFHAND = 0x00000080, // also shield case - added in 3.x, possible all later not used in pre-3.x
521  // UNIT_FLAG2_UNK8 = 0x00000100,
522  // UNIT_FLAG2_UNK9 = 0x00000200,
523  // UNIT_FLAG2_DISARM_RANGED = 0x00000400, // added in 3.x
524  // UNIT_FLAG2_REGENERATE_POWER = 0x00000800, // added in 3.x
525 };
526 
528 enum NPCFlags
529 {
530  UNIT_NPC_FLAG_NONE = 0x00000000,
531  UNIT_NPC_FLAG_GOSSIP = 0x00000001, // 100%
532  UNIT_NPC_FLAG_QUESTGIVER = 0x00000002, // guessed, probably ok
533  UNIT_NPC_FLAG_UNK1 = 0x00000004,
534  UNIT_NPC_FLAG_UNK2 = 0x00000008,
535  UNIT_NPC_FLAG_TRAINER = 0x00000010, // 100%
536  UNIT_NPC_FLAG_TRAINER_CLASS = 0x00000020, // 100%
537  UNIT_NPC_FLAG_TRAINER_PROFESSION = 0x00000040, // 100%
538  UNIT_NPC_FLAG_VENDOR = 0x00000080, // 100%
539  UNIT_NPC_FLAG_VENDOR_AMMO = 0x00000100, // 100%, general goods vendor
540  UNIT_NPC_FLAG_VENDOR_FOOD = 0x00000200, // 100%
541  UNIT_NPC_FLAG_VENDOR_POISON = 0x00000400, // guessed
542  UNIT_NPC_FLAG_VENDOR_REAGENT = 0x00000800, // 100%
543  UNIT_NPC_FLAG_REPAIR = 0x00001000, // 100%
544  UNIT_NPC_FLAG_FLIGHTMASTER = 0x00002000, // 100%
545  UNIT_NPC_FLAG_SPIRITHEALER = 0x00004000, // guessed
546  UNIT_NPC_FLAG_SPIRITGUIDE = 0x00008000, // guessed
547  UNIT_NPC_FLAG_INNKEEPER = 0x00010000, // 100%
548  UNIT_NPC_FLAG_BANKER = 0x00020000, // 100%
549  UNIT_NPC_FLAG_PETITIONER = 0x00040000, // 100% 0xC0000 = guild petitions, 0x40000 = arena team petitions
550  UNIT_NPC_FLAG_TABARDDESIGNER = 0x00080000, // 100%
551  UNIT_NPC_FLAG_BATTLEMASTER = 0x00100000, // 100%
552  UNIT_NPC_FLAG_AUCTIONEER = 0x00200000, // 100%
553  UNIT_NPC_FLAG_STABLEMASTER = 0x00400000, // 100%
554  UNIT_NPC_FLAG_GUILD_BANKER = 0x00800000, // cause client to send 997 opcode
555  UNIT_NPC_FLAG_SPELLCLICK = 0x01000000, // cause client to send 1015 opcode (spell click), dynamic, set at loading and don't must be set in DB
556 };

567 enum DiminishingLevels
568 {
569  DIMINISHING_LEVEL_1 = 0, //< Won't make a difference to stun duration
570  DIMINISHING_LEVEL_2 = 1, //< Reduces stun time by 50%
571  DIMINISHING_LEVEL_3 = 2, //< Reduces stun time by 75%
572  DIMINISHING_LEVEL_IMMUNE = 3 //< The target is immune to the DiminishingGrouop
573 };
574 
583 struct DiminishingReturn
584 {
585  DiminishingReturn(DiminishingGroup group, uint32 t, uint32 count)
586  : DRGroup(group), stack(0), hitTime(t), hitCount(count)
587  {}
588 
592  DiminishingGroup DRGroup: 16;
597  uint16 stack: 16;
604  uint32 hitTime;
609  uint32 hitCount;
610 };

612 // At least some values expected fixed and used in auras field, other custom

617  MELEE_HIT_DODGE = 2, // used as misc in SPELL_AURA_IGNORE_COMBAT_RESULT
618  MELEE_HIT_BLOCK = 3, // used as misc in SPELL_AURA_IGNORE_COMBAT_RESULT
619  MELEE_HIT_PARRY = 4, // used as misc in SPELL_AURA_IGNORE_COMBAT_RESULT
620  MELEE_HIT_GLANCING = 5,
621  MELEE_HIT_CRIT = 6,
622  MELEE_HIT_CRUSHING = 7,

624  MELEE_HIT_BLOCK_CRIT = 9,

627 enum UnitCombatDieSide
628 {
629  UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_MISS,
630  UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_RESIST,
631  UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_DODGE,
632  UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_PARRY,
633  UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_DEFLECT,
634  UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_BLOCK,
635  UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_GLANCE,
636  UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_CRIT,
637  UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_CRUSH,
638  UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_HIT,
639 };
640 
641 #define NUM_UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_SIDES (UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_HIT + 1)
642 
643 // A little helper func for a nice attack table debug output
644 inline const char* UnitCombatDieSideText(UnitCombatDieSide side)
645 {
646  switch (side)
647  {
648  case UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_MISS: return "MISS";
649  case UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_RESIST: return "RESIST";
650  case UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_DODGE: return "DODGE";
651  case UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_PARRY: return "PARRY";
652  case UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_DEFLECT: return "DEFLECT";
653  case UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_BLOCK: return "BLOCK";
654  case UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_GLANCE: return "GLANCE";
655  case UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_CRIT: return "CRIT";
656  case UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_CRUSH: return "CRUSH";
657  case UNIT_COMBAT_DIE_HIT: return "HIT";
658  }
659  return "INVALID";
660 }
661 
662 struct CleanDamage
663 {
664  CleanDamage(uint32 _damage, WeaponAttackType _attackType, MeleeHitOutcome _hitOutCome, bool _takenOrAbsorbedDamage) :
665  damage(_damage), attackType(_attackType), hitOutCome(_hitOutCome), takenOrAbsorbedDamage(_takenOrAbsorbedDamage) {}
666 
667  uint32 damage; // only used for rage generation
668  WeaponAttackType attackType;
669  MeleeHitOutcome hitOutCome;
670  bool takenOrAbsorbedDamage;
671 };

681 // Struct for use in Unit::CalculateMeleeDamage

689  uint32 blocked_amount;
690  uint32 HitInfo;

692  // Helper
693  WeaponAttackType attackType; //
694  uint32 procAttacker;
695  uint32 procVictim;
696  uint32 procEx;
697  uint32 cleanDamage; // Used only for rage calculation
698  uint32 absorb;
699  MeleeHitOutcome hitOutCome; // TODO: remove this field (need use TargetState)
700 };

702 // Spell damage info structure based on structure sending in SMSG_SPELLNONMELEEDAMAGELOG opcode
703 struct SpellNonMeleeDamage
704 {
705  SpellNonMeleeDamage(WorldObject* _attacker, Unit* _target, uint32 _SpellID, SpellSchoolMask _schoolMask, Spell* spell = nullptr)
706  : target(_target), attacker(_attacker), SpellID(_SpellID), damage(0), schoolMask(_schoolMask),
707  absorb(0), resist(0), periodicLog(false), unused(false), blocked(0), HitInfo(0), spell(spell)
708  {}
709 
710  Unit* target;
711  WorldObject* attacker;
712  uint32 SpellID;
713  uint32 damage;
714  SpellSchoolMask schoolMask;
715  uint32 absorb;
716  int32 resist;
717  bool periodicLog;
718  bool unused;
719  uint32 blocked;
720  uint32 HitInfo;
721  Spell* spell;
722 };

727  : aura(_aura), damage(_damage), absorb(_absorb), resist(_resist), multiplier(_multiplier) {}

734 };

738 struct CombatData
739 {
740  public:
741  CombatData(Unit* owner) : threatManager(ThreatManager(owner)), hostileRefManager(HostileRefManager(owner)) {};
742 
743  // Manage all Units threatening us
744  ThreatManager threatManager;
745  // Manage all Units that are threatened by us
746  HostileRefManager hostileRefManager;
747 };
748 
749 enum SpellAuraProcResult
750 {
751  SPELL_AURA_PROC_OK = 0, // proc was processed, will remove charges
752  SPELL_AURA_PROC_FAILED = 1, // proc failed - if at least one aura failed the proc, charges won't be taken
753  SPELL_AURA_PROC_CANT_TRIGGER = 2, // aura can't trigger - skip charges taking, move to next aura if exists
754 };
755 
756 // Unit* victim, uint32 procAttacker, uint32 procVictim, uint32 procExtra, uint32 amount, WeaponAttackType attType, SpellEntry const* spellInfo, bool dontTriggerSpecial
757 
758 // External struct for passing on data
759 struct ProcSystemArguments
760 {
761  Unit* attacker;
762  Unit* victim;
763 
764  uint32 procFlagsAttacker;
765  uint32 procFlagsVictim;
766  uint32 procExtra;
767 
768  uint32 damage; // contains full heal or full damage
769  SpellEntry const* spellInfo;
770  WeaponAttackType attType;
771 
772  Spell* spell;
773 
774  // Healing specific information
775  uint32 healthGain;
776  bool isHeal;
777 
778  explicit ProcSystemArguments(Unit* attacker, Unit* victim, uint32 procFlagsAttacker, uint32 procFlagsVictim, uint32 procExtra, uint32 amount, WeaponAttackType attType = BASE_ATTACK,
779  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = nullptr, Spell* spell = nullptr, uint32 healthGain = 0, bool isHeal = false) : attacker(attacker), victim(victim), procFlagsAttacker(procFlagsAttacker), procFlagsVictim(procFlagsVictim), procExtra(procExtra), damage(amount),
780  spellInfo(spellInfo), attType(attType), spell(spell), healthGain(healthGain), isHeal(isHeal)
781  {
782  }
783 };
784 
785 // Internal struct for passing data to execution
786 struct ProcExecutionData
787 {
788  // these are same for proc on attackers auras and victims auras
789  Unit* attacker;
790  Unit* victim;
791 
792  // these change based on isVictim
793  bool isVictim;
794  Unit* source;
795  Unit* target;
796 
797  uint32 procFlags;
798  uint32 procExtra;
799 
800  WeaponAttackType attType;
801  uint32 damage; // contains full heal or full damage
802  SpellEntry const* spellInfo; // filled always even on aura tick
803 
804  Spell* spell; // only filled on direct spell execution
805 
806  // Healing specific information
807  uint32 healthGain;
808  bool isHeal;
809 
810  Aura* triggeredByAura;
811  uint32 cooldown;
812 
813  // Scripting data
814  uint32 triggeredSpellId; // used to designate if a proc was overriden if > 0
815  std::array<int32, MAX_EFFECT_INDEX> basepoints = { 0, 0, 0 };
816  bool procOnce;
817  Unit* triggerTarget;
818  ObjectGuid triggerOriginalCaster; // not filled by default
819 
820  ProcExecutionData(ProcSystemArguments& data, bool isVictim);
821 };
822 typedef SpellAuraProcResult(Unit::*pAuraProcHandler)(ProcExecutionData& data);
823 extern pAuraProcHandler AuraProcHandler[TOTAL_AURAS];

825 enum CurrentSpellTypes
826 {
827  CURRENT_MELEE_SPELL = 0,
828  CURRENT_GENERIC_SPELL = 1,
829  CURRENT_AUTOREPEAT_SPELL = 2,
830  CURRENT_CHANNELED_SPELL = 3,
831  CURRENT_MAX_SPELL
832 };
833 
834 #define CURRENT_FIRST_NON_MELEE_SPELL 1
835 
836 enum ActiveStates
837 {
838  ACT_PASSIVE = 0x01, // 0x01 - passive
839  ACT_DISABLED = 0x81, // 0x80 - castable
840  ACT_ENABLED = 0xC1, // 0x40 | 0x80 - auto cast + castable
841  ACT_COMMAND = 0x07, // 0x01 | 0x02 | 0x04
842  ACT_REACTION = 0x06, // 0x02 | 0x04
843  ACT_DECIDE = 0x00 // custom
844 };
845 
846 enum CommandStates
847 {
848  COMMAND_STAY = 0,
849  COMMAND_FOLLOW = 1,
850  COMMAND_ATTACK = 2,
851  COMMAND_DISMISS = 3
852 };
853 
854 #define UNIT_ACTION_BUTTON_ACTION(X) (uint32(X) & 0x00FFFFFF)
855 #define UNIT_ACTION_BUTTON_TYPE(X) ((uint32(X) & 0xFF000000) >> 24)
856 #define MAX_UNIT_ACTION_BUTTON_ACTION_VALUE (0x00FFFFFF+1)
857 #define MAKE_UNIT_ACTION_BUTTON(A,T) (uint32(A) | (uint32(T) << 24))
858 
859 struct UnitActionBarEntry
860 {
861  UnitActionBarEntry() : packedData(uint32(ACT_DISABLED) << 24) {}
862 
863  uint32 packedData;
864 
865  // helper
866  ActiveStates GetType() const { return ActiveStates(UNIT_ACTION_BUTTON_TYPE(packedData)); }
867  uint32 GetAction() const { return UNIT_ACTION_BUTTON_ACTION(packedData); }
868  bool IsActionBarForSpell() const
869  {
870  ActiveStates Type = GetType();
871  return Type == ACT_DISABLED || Type == ACT_ENABLED || Type == ACT_PASSIVE;
872  }
873 
874  void SetActionAndType(uint32 action, ActiveStates type)
875  {
876  packedData = MAKE_UNIT_ACTION_BUTTON(action, type);
877  }
878 
879  void SetType(ActiveStates type)
880  {
881  packedData = MAKE_UNIT_ACTION_BUTTON(UNIT_ACTION_BUTTON_ACTION(packedData), type);
882  }
883 
884  void SetAction(uint32 action)
885  {
886  packedData = (packedData & 0xFF000000) | UNIT_ACTION_BUTTON_ACTION(action);
887  }
888 };
889 
890 typedef UnitActionBarEntry CharmSpellEntry;
891 
892 enum ActionBarIndex
893 {
894  ACTION_BAR_INDEX_START = 0,
895  ACTION_BAR_INDEX_PET_SPELL_START = 3,
896  ACTION_BAR_INDEX_PET_SPELL_END = 7,
897  ACTION_BAR_INDEX_END = 10,
898 };
899 
900 #define MAX_UNIT_ACTION_BAR_INDEX (ACTION_BAR_INDEX_END-ACTION_BAR_INDEX_START)
901 
902 struct CharmInfo
903 {
904  public:
905  explicit CharmInfo(Unit* unit);
906  ~CharmInfo();
907 
908  void SetCharmState(std::string const& ainame, bool withNewThreatList = true);
909  void SetCharmState(UnitAI* ai, bool withNewThreatList = true);
910  void ResetCharmState();
911  uint32 GetPetNumber() const { return m_petnumber; }
912  void SetPetNumber(uint32 petnumber, bool statwindow);
913  uint32 GetPetLastAttackCommandTime() const { return m_petLastAttackCommandTime; }
914  void SetPetLastAttackCommandTime(uint32 time) { m_petLastAttackCommandTime = time; }
915 
916  void SetCommandState(CommandStates st);
917  CommandStates GetCommandState() { return m_CommandState; }
918  bool HasCommandState(CommandStates state) { return (m_CommandState == state); }
919 
920  void InitPossessCreateSpells();
921  void InitCharmCreateSpells();
922  void InitPetActionBar();
923  void InitEmptyActionBar();
924  void ProcessUnattackableTargets(CombatData* combatData);
925 
926  // return true if successful
927  bool AddSpellToActionBar(uint32 spellId, ActiveStates newstate = ACT_DECIDE, uint8 forceSlot = 255);
928  bool RemoveSpellFromActionBar(uint32 spellId);
929  void LoadPetActionBar(const std::string& data);
930  void BuildActionBar(WorldPacket& data) const;
931  void SetSpellAutocast(uint32 spell_id, bool state);
932  void SetActionBar(uint8 index, uint32 spellOrAction, ActiveStates type)
933  {
934  PetActionBar[index].SetActionAndType(spellOrAction, type);
935  }
936  UnitActionBarEntry const* GetActionBarEntry(uint8 index) const { return &(PetActionBar[index]); }
937 
938  void ToggleCreatureAutocast(uint32 spellid, bool apply);
939 
940  CharmSpellEntry* GetCharmSpell(uint8 index) { return &(m_charmspells[index]); }
941 
942  void SetIsRetreating(bool retreating = false) { m_retreating = retreating; }
943  bool GetIsRetreating() const { return m_retreating; }
944 
945  void ResetStayPosition();
946  void SetStayPosition();
947  bool UpdateStayPosition();
948 
949  float GetStayPosX() const { return m_stayPosX; }
950  float GetStayPosY() const { return m_stayPosY; }
951  float GetStayPosZ() const { return m_stayPosZ; }
952  float GetStayPosO() const { return m_stayPosO; }
953 
954  uint32 GetSpellOpener() const { return m_opener; }
955  uint32 GetSpellOpenerMinRange() const { return m_openerMinRange; }
956  uint32 GetSpellOpenerMaxRange() const { return m_openerMaxRange; }
957 
958  void SetSpellOpener(uint32 spellId = 0, uint32 minRange = 0, uint32 maxRange = 0)
959  {
960  m_opener = spellId;
961  m_openerMinRange = minRange;
962  m_openerMaxRange = maxRange;
963  }
964 
965  UnitAI* GetAI() const { return m_ai; }
966  CombatData* GetCombatData() const { return m_combatData; };
967 
968  void SetCharmStartPosition(Position const& position) { m_charmStartPosition = position; }
969  Position const& GetCharmStartPosition() { return m_charmStartPosition; }
970 
971  void SetWalk(bool walk) { m_walk = walk; }
972  bool GetWalk() const { return m_walk; }
973 
974  Unit* GetUnit() { return m_unit; }
975 
976  private:
977  Unit* m_unit;
978  UnitAI* m_ai;
979  CombatData* m_combatData;
980  UnitActionBarEntry PetActionBar[MAX_UNIT_ACTION_BAR_INDEX];
981  CharmSpellEntry m_charmspells[CREATURE_MAX_SPELLS];
982  CommandStates m_CommandState;
983  uint32 m_petnumber;
984  uint32 m_petLastAttackCommandTime;
985  uint32 m_opener;
986  uint32 m_openerMinRange;
987  uint32 m_openerMaxRange;
988  uint32 m_unitFieldFlags;
989  uint8 m_unitFieldBytes2_1;
990  bool m_retreating;
991  bool m_stayPosSet;
992  float m_stayPosX;
993  float m_stayPosY;
994  float m_stayPosZ;
995  float m_stayPosO;
996 
997  Position m_charmStartPosition;
998  bool m_walk;
999 
1000  bool m_deleted;
1001 };

1003 // used in CallForAllControlledUnits/CheckAllControlledUnits
1004 enum ControlledUnitMask
1005 {
1006  CONTROLLED_PET = 0x01,
1007  CONTROLLED_MINIPET = 0x02,
1008  CONTROLLED_GUARDIANS = 0x04, // including PROTECTOR_PET
1009  CONTROLLED_CHARM = 0x08,
1010  CONTROLLED_TOTEMS = 0x10,
1011 };

1027 // delay time next attack to prevent client attack animation problems
1028 #define ATTACK_DISPLAY_DELAY 200
1029 #define MAX_PLAYER_STEALTH_DETECT_RANGE 45.0f // max distance for detection targets by player
1030 #define MAX_CREATURE_ATTACK_RADIUS 45.0f // max distance for creature aggro (use with CONFIG_FLOAT_RATE_CREATURE_AGGRO)

1036 // Power type values defines
1037 enum PowerDefaults
1038 {
1039  POWER_RAGE_DEFAULT = 1000,
1040  POWER_FOCUS_DEFAULT = 100,
1041  POWER_ENERGY_DEFAULT = 100,
1042  POWER_HAPPINESS_DEFAULT = 1000000,
1043 };
1044 
1045 // Selection method used by SelectAttackingTarget
1046 enum AttackingTarget
1047 {
1048  ATTACKING_TARGET_RANDOM = 0, // Just selects a random target
1049  ATTACKING_TARGET_TOPAGGRO, // Selects targes from top aggro to bottom
1050  ATTACKING_TARGET_BOTTOMAGGRO, // Selects targets from bottom aggro to top
1051  ATTACKING_TARGET_NEAREST_BY, // Selects the nearest by target
1052  ATTACKING_TARGET_FARTHEST_AWAY, // Selects the farthest away target
1053  ATTACKING_TARGET_ALL_SUITABLE,
1054 };
1055 
1056 enum SelectFlags
1057 {
1058  SELECT_FLAG_IN_LOS = 0x0001, // Default Selection Requirement for Spell-targets
1059  SELECT_FLAG_PLAYER = 0x0002,
1060  SELECT_FLAG_POWER_MANA = 0x0004, // For Energy based spells, like manaburn
1061  SELECT_FLAG_POWER_RAGE = 0x0008,
1062  SELECT_FLAG_POWER_ENERGY = 0x0010,
1063  SELECT_FLAG_IN_MELEE_RANGE = 0x0040,
1064  SELECT_FLAG_NOT_IN_MELEE_RANGE = 0x0080,
1065  SELECT_FLAG_HAS_AURA = 0x0100,
1066  SELECT_FLAG_NOT_AURA = 0x0200,
1067  SELECT_FLAG_RANGE_RANGE = 0x0400, // For direct targeted abilities like charge or frostbolt but need custom data
1068  SELECT_FLAG_RANGE_AOE_RANGE = 0x0800, // For AOE targeted abilities like frost nova but need custom data
1069  SELECT_FLAG_POWER_NOT_MANA = 0x1000, // Used in some dungeon encounters
1070  SELECT_FLAG_USE_EFFECT_RADIUS = 0x2000, // For AOE targeted abilities which have correct data in effect index 0
1071  SELECT_FLAG_SKIP_TANK = 0x4000, // Not GetVictim - tank is not always top threat
1072  SELECT_FLAG_CASTING = 0x8000, // Selects only targets that are casting
1073  SELECT_FLAG_SKIP_CUSTOM =0x10000, // skips custom target
1074  SELECT_FLAG_NOT_IMMUNE =0x20000,
1075  SELECT_FLAG_USE_EFFECT_RADIUS_OF_TRIGGERED_SPELL = 0x40000 // For AOE targeted abilities which have correct data in triggered spell effect index 0
1076 };
1077 
1078 struct SelectAttackingTargetParams
1079 {
1080  union
1081  {
1082  struct
1083  {
1084  uint32 minRange;
1085  uint32 maxRange;
1086  } range;
1087  struct
1088  {
1089  uint64 guid;
1090  } skip;
1091  struct
1092  {
1093  uint32 params[2];
1094  } raw;
1095  };
1096 };
1097 
1098 struct SpellProcEventEntry; // used only privately
1099 
1100 class Unit : public WorldObject
1101 {
1102  public:
1103  typedef std::set<Unit*> AttackerSet;
1104  typedef std::multimap<uint32 /*spellId*/, SpellAuraHolder*> SpellAuraHolderMap;
1105  typedef std::pair<SpellAuraHolderMap::iterator, SpellAuraHolderMap::iterator> SpellAuraHolderBounds;
1106  typedef std::pair<SpellAuraHolderMap::const_iterator, SpellAuraHolderMap::const_iterator> SpellAuraHolderConstBounds;
1107  typedef std::list<SpellAuraHolder*> SpellAuraHolderList;
1108  typedef std::list<Aura*> AuraList;
1109  typedef std::list<DiminishingReturn> Diminishing;
1110  typedef std::set<uint32 /*playerGuidLow*/> ComboPointHolderSet;
1111  typedef std::map<SpellEntry const*, ObjectGuid /*targetGuid*/> TrackedAuraTargetMap;
1112 
1113  virtual ~Unit();
1114 
1115  void AddToWorld() override;
1116  void RemoveFromWorld() override;
1117 
1118  void CleanupsBeforeDelete() override; // used in ~Creature/~Player (or before mass creature delete to remove cross-references to already deleted units)
1119 
1120  float GetCollisionHeight() const override;
1121  float GetCollisionWidth() const override;
1122  float GetObjectBoundingRadius() const override { return m_floatValues[UNIT_FIELD_BOUNDINGRADIUS]; } // overwrite WorldObject version
1123  float GetCombatReach() const override { return m_floatValues[UNIT_FIELD_COMBATREACH]; } // overwrite WorldObject version
1124 
1130  DiminishingLevels GetDiminishing(DiminishingGroup group);
1137  void IncrDiminishing(DiminishingGroup group, bool pvp);
1149  void ApplyDiminishingToDuration(DiminishingGroup group, int32& duration, Unit* caster, DiminishingLevels Level, bool isReflected, SpellEntry const* spellInfo, bool hasAuraScript);
1156  void ApplyDiminishingAura(DiminishingGroup group, bool apply);
1160  void ClearDiminishings() { m_Diminishing.clear(); }
1161 
1162  void Update(const uint32 diff) override;
1163  void Heartbeat() override;
1164 
1170  void setAttackTimer(WeaponAttackType type, uint32 time) { m_attackTimer[type] = time; }
1176  void resetAttackTimer(WeaponAttackType type = BASE_ATTACK);
1182  uint32 getAttackTimer(WeaponAttackType type) const { return m_attackTimer[type]; }
1189  bool isAttackReady(WeaponAttackType type = BASE_ATTACK) const { return m_attackTimer[type] == 0; }
1194  virtual bool hasWeapon(WeaponAttackType type) const = 0;
1195  inline bool hasMainhandWeapon() const { return hasWeapon(BASE_ATTACK); }
1196  inline bool hasOffhandWeapon() const { return hasWeapon(OFF_ATTACK); }
1197  inline bool hasRangedWeapon() const { return hasWeapon(RANGED_ATTACK); }
1202  virtual bool hasWeaponForAttack(WeaponAttackType type) const { return CanUseEquippedWeapon(type); }
1203  inline bool hasMainhandWeaponForAttack() const { return hasWeaponForAttack(BASE_ATTACK); }
1204  inline bool hasOffhandWeaponForAttack() const { return hasWeaponForAttack(OFF_ATTACK); }
1205  inline bool hasRangedWeaponForAttack() const { return hasWeaponForAttack(RANGED_ATTACK); }
1213  bool UpdateMeleeAttackingState();
1219  bool CanUseEquippedWeapon(WeaponAttackType attackType) const
1220  {
1221  if (IsNoWeaponShapeShift())
1222  return false;
1223 
1224  switch (attackType)
1225  {
1226  default:
1227  case BASE_ATTACK:
1228  return !HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_DISARMED);
1229  case OFF_ATTACK:
1230  case RANGED_ATTACK:
1231  return true;
1232  }
1233  }
1240  bool CanReachWithMeleeAttack(Unit const* pVictim, float flat_mod = 0.0f) const;
1241  uint32 m_extraAttacks;
1242  void DoExtraAttacks(Unit* pVictim);
1243 
1244  bool IsAttackedBy(Unit* attacker) const
1245  {
1246  if (m_attackers.find(attacker) != m_attackers.end())
1247  return true;
1248 
1249  return false;
1250  }
1251 
1252  bool _addAttacker(Unit* pAttacker) //< (Internal Use) must be called only from Unit::Attack(Unit*)
1253  {
1254  AttackerSet::const_iterator itr = m_attackers.find(pAttacker);
1255  if (itr == m_attackers.end())
1256  {
1257  m_attackers.insert(pAttacker);
1258  return true;
1259  }
1260  return false;
1261  }
1262  void _removeAttacker(Unit* pAttacker) //< (Internal Use) must be called only from Unit::AttackStop()
1263  {
1264  m_attackers.erase(pAttacker);
1265  }
1266  Unit* getAttackerForHelper() //< Return a possible enemy from this unit to help in combat
1267  {
1268  if (GetVictim() != nullptr)
1269  return GetVictim();
1270 
1271  if (!m_attackers.empty())
1272  return *(m_attackers.begin());
1273 
1274  return nullptr;
1275  }
1283  bool Attack(Unit* victim, bool meleeAttack);
1289  void AttackedBy(Unit* attacker);
1295  void CastStop(uint32 except_spellid = 0);
1303  bool AttackStop(bool targetSwitch = false, bool includingCast = false, bool includingCombo = false, bool clientInitiated = false);
1310  void RemoveAllAttackers();
1311 
1312  void MeleeAttackStart(Unit* victim);
1313  void MeleeAttackStop(Unit* victim);
1314 
1316  AttackerSet const& getAttackers() const { return m_attackers; }
1317 
1318  Unit* GetVictim() const { return m_attacking; } //< Returns the victim that this unit is currently attacking
1319  void CombatStop(bool includingCast = false, bool includingCombo = true); //< Stop this unit from combat, if includingCast==true, also interrupt casting
1320  void CombatStopWithPets(bool includingCast = false, bool includingCombo = true);
1321  void StopAttackFaction(uint32 faction_id);
1322  Unit* SelectRandomUnfriendlyTarget(Unit* except = nullptr, float radius = ATTACK_DISTANCE) const;
1323  Unit* SelectRandomFriendlyTarget(Unit* except = nullptr, float radius = ATTACK_DISTANCE) const;
1324  bool HasDamageInterruptibleStunAura() const;
1325  bool HasBreakableByDamageCrowdControlAura(Unit* excludeCasterChannel = nullptr, uint32 excludeAuraApplyMSTimeCutoff = 0) const;
1326  bool HasBreakableByDamageAuraType(AuraType type, uint32 excludeAura, uint32 excludeAuraApplyMSTimeCutoff) const;
1327  bool HasAuraPetShouldAvoidBreaking(Unit* excludeCasterChannel = nullptr, uint32 excludeAuraApplyMSTimeCutoff = 0) const;
1328  void SendMeleeAttackStop(const Unit& victim) const;
1329  void SendMeleeAttackStart(const Unit& victim) const;
1330 
1331  void addUnitState(uint32 f) { m_state |= f; }
1332  bool hasUnitState(uint32 f) const { return (m_state & f) != 0; }
1333  void clearUnitState(uint32 f) { m_state &= ~f; }
1334  bool CanFreeMove() const { return !hasUnitState(UNIT_STAT_NO_FREE_MOVE) && !GetOwnerGuid(); }
1335 
1336  virtual uint32 GetLevelForTarget(Unit const* /*target*/) const { return GetLevel(); }
1337  bool IsTrivialForTarget(Unit const* pov) const;
1338 
1339  void SetLevel(uint32 lvl);
1340 
1341  uint32 GetLevel() const override { return GetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_LEVEL); }
1342  uint8 getRace() const { return GetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_0, UNIT_BYTES_0_OFFSET_RACE); }
1343  uint32 getRaceMask() const { return 1 << (getRace() - 1); }
1344  uint8 getClass() const { return GetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_0, UNIT_BYTES_0_OFFSET_CLASS); }
1345  uint32 getClassMask() const { return 1 << (getClass() - 1); }
1346  uint8 getGender() const { return GetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_0, UNIT_BYTES_0_OFFSET_GENDER); }
1347 
1348  float GetStat(Stats stat) const { return float(GetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_STAT0 + stat)); }
1349  void SetStat(Stats stat, int32 val) { SetStatInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_STAT0 + stat, val); }
1350 
1351  inline int32 GetArmor() const { return GetResistance(SPELL_SCHOOL_NORMAL) ; }
1352  inline void SetArmor(int32 val) { SetStatInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_RESISTANCES, val); }
1353 
1354  inline int32 GetResistance(SpellSchools school) const { return GetInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_RESISTANCES + school); }
1355  inline void SetResistance(SpellSchools school, int32 val) { SetInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_RESISTANCES + school, val); }
1356 
1357  uint32 GetHealth() const { return GetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_HEALTH); }
1358  uint32 GetMaxHealth() const { return GetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_MAXHEALTH); }
1359  float GetHealthPercent() const { return (GetHealth() * 100.0f) / GetMaxHealth(); }
1360  void SetHealth(uint32 val);
1361  void SetMaxHealth(uint32 val);
1362  void SetHealthPercent(float percent);
1363  int32 ModifyHealth(int32 dVal);
1364  float OCTRegenHPPerSpirit() const;
1365  float OCTRegenMPPerSpirit() const;
1366 
1367  Powers GetPowerType() const { return Powers(GetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_0, UNIT_BYTES_0_OFFSET_POWER_TYPE)); }
1368  void SetPowerType(Powers new_powertype);
1369  uint32 GetPower(Powers power) const { return GetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_POWER1 + power); }
1370  uint32 GetMaxPower(Powers power) const { return GetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_MAXPOWER1 + power); }
1371  float GetPowerPercent() const { return (GetMaxPower(GetPowerType()) == 0) ? 0.0f : (GetPower(GetPowerType()) * 100.0f) / GetMaxPower(GetPowerType()); }
1372  float GetPowerPercent(Powers power) const { return (GetMaxPower(power) == 0) ? 0.0f : (GetPower(power) * 100.0f) / GetMaxPower(power); }
1373  void SetPower(Powers power, uint32 val);
1374  void SetMaxPower(Powers power, uint32 val);
1375  int32 ModifyPower(Powers power, int32 dVal);
1376  void ApplyPowerMod(Powers power, uint32 val, bool apply);
1377  void ApplyMaxPowerMod(Powers power, uint32 val, bool apply);
1378  bool HasMana() { return GetPowerType() == POWER_MANA; }
1379 
1380  uint32 GetAttackTime(WeaponAttackType att) const { return (uint32)(GetFloatValue(UNIT_FIELD_BASEATTACKTIME + att) / m_modAttackSpeedPct[att]); }
1381  void SetAttackTime(WeaponAttackType att, uint32 val) { SetFloatValue(UNIT_FIELD_BASEATTACKTIME + att, val * m_modAttackSpeedPct[att]); }
1382  void ApplyAttackTimePercentMod(WeaponAttackType att, float val, bool apply);
1383  void ApplyCastTimePercentMod(float val, bool apply);
1384

1386  virtual void SetSheath(SheathState sheathed) { SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2, UNIT_BYTES_2_OFFSET_SHEATH_STATE, sheathed); }

1395  {
1396  if (FactionTemplateEntry const* entry = GetFactionTemplateEntry())
1397  return entry->IsContestedGuardFaction();
1398 
1399  return false;
1400  }

1459  uint32 GetCreatureTypeMask() const
1460  {
1461  uint32 creatureType = GetCreatureType();
1462  return (creatureType >= 1) ? (1 << (creatureType - 1)) : 0;
1463  }

1616  uint32 GetUnitMeleeSkill(Unit const* target = nullptr) const { return (target ? GetLevelForTarget(target) : GetLevel()) * 5; }

1624  bool isVendor() const { return HasFlag(UNIT_NPC_FLAGS, UNIT_NPC_FLAG_VENDOR); }
1625  bool isTrainer() const { return HasFlag(UNIT_NPC_FLAGS, UNIT_NPC_FLAG_TRAINER); }
1626  bool isQuestGiver() const { return HasFlag(UNIT_NPC_FLAGS, UNIT_NPC_FLAG_QUESTGIVER); }
1627  bool isGossip() const { return HasFlag(UNIT_NPC_FLAGS, UNIT_NPC_FLAG_GOSSIP); }
1628  bool isTaxi() const { return HasFlag(UNIT_NPC_FLAGS, UNIT_NPC_FLAG_FLIGHTMASTER); }
1629  bool isGuildMaster() const { return HasFlag(UNIT_NPC_FLAGS, UNIT_NPC_FLAG_PETITIONER); }
1630  bool isBattleMaster() const { return HasFlag(UNIT_NPC_FLAGS, UNIT_NPC_FLAG_BATTLEMASTER); }
1631  bool isBanker() const { return HasFlag(UNIT_NPC_FLAGS, UNIT_NPC_FLAG_BANKER); }
1632  bool isInnkeeper() const { return HasFlag(UNIT_NPC_FLAGS, UNIT_NPC_FLAG_INNKEEPER); }
1633  bool isSpiritHealer() const { return HasFlag(UNIT_NPC_FLAGS, UNIT_NPC_FLAG_SPIRITHEALER); }
1634  bool isSpiritGuide() const { return HasFlag(UNIT_NPC_FLAGS, UNIT_NPC_FLAG_SPIRITGUIDE); }
1635  bool isTabardDesigner()const { return HasFlag(UNIT_NPC_FLAGS, UNIT_NPC_FLAG_TABARDDESIGNER); }
1636  bool isAuctioner() const { return HasFlag(UNIT_NPC_FLAGS, UNIT_NPC_FLAG_AUCTIONEER); }
1637  bool isArmorer() const { return HasFlag(UNIT_NPC_FLAGS, UNIT_NPC_FLAG_REPAIR); }
1638  bool isServiceProvider() const
1639  {
1640  return HasFlag(UNIT_NPC_FLAGS,
1641  UNIT_NPC_FLAG_VENDOR | UNIT_NPC_FLAG_TRAINER | UNIT_NPC_FLAG_FLIGHTMASTER |
1642  UNIT_NPC_FLAG_PETITIONER | UNIT_NPC_FLAG_BATTLEMASTER | UNIT_NPC_FLAG_BANKER |
1643  UNIT_NPC_FLAG_INNKEEPER | UNIT_NPC_FLAG_SPIRITHEALER |
1644  UNIT_NPC_FLAG_SPIRITGUIDE | UNIT_NPC_FLAG_TABARDDESIGNER | UNIT_NPC_FLAG_AUCTIONEER);
1645  }
1646  bool isSpiritService() const { return HasFlag(UNIT_NPC_FLAGS, UNIT_NPC_FLAG_SPIRITHEALER | UNIT_NPC_FLAG_SPIRITGUIDE); }
1647 
1648  bool IsTaxiFlying() const { return hasUnitState(UNIT_STAT_TAXI_FLIGHT); }
1649 
1650  bool IsInCombat() const { return HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_IN_COMBAT); }

1655  inline void SetOutOfCombatWithAggressor(Unit* aggressor) { SetInCombatWithAggressor(aggressor, true); }
1656  void SetInCombatWithAssisted(Unit* assisted, bool touchOnly = false);
1657  inline void SetOutOfCombatWithAssisted(Unit* assisted) { SetInCombatWithAssisted(assisted, true); }
1658  void SetInCombatWithVictim(Unit* victim, bool touchOnly = false);
1659  inline void SetOutOfCombatWithVictim(Unit* victim) { SetInCombatWithVictim(victim, true); }

1667  SpellAuraHolderBounds GetSpellAuraHolderBounds(uint32 spell_id)
1668  {
1669  return m_spellAuraHolders.equal_range(spell_id);
1670  }
1671  SpellAuraHolderConstBounds GetSpellAuraHolderBounds(uint32 spell_id) const
1672  {
1673  return m_spellAuraHolders.equal_range(spell_id);
1674  }

1676  uint32 GetAuraCount(uint32 spellId) const;
1677 
1678  bool HasAuraType(AuraType auraType) const;
1679  bool HasAffectedAura(AuraType auraType, SpellEntry const* spellProto) const;
1680  bool HasAura(uint32 spellId, SpellEffectIndex effIndex) const;
1681  bool HasAura(uint32 spellId) const
1682  {
1683  return m_spellAuraHolders.find(spellId) != m_spellAuraHolders.end();
1684  }
1685  bool HasAuraTypeWithCaster(AuraType auratype, ObjectGuid caster) const;
1686  bool HasMechanicMaskOrDispelMaskAura(uint32 dispelMask, uint32 mechanicMask, Unit const* caster) const;
1687  bool HasNegativeAuraWithInterruptFlag(SpellAuraInterruptFlags flag) const;
1688  template<typename Func>
1689  bool HasAuraHolder(Func func) const
1690  {
1691  auto const& Auras = GetSpellAuraHolderMap();
1692  for (auto itr = Auras.begin(); itr != Auras.end(); ++itr)
1693  {
1694  SpellAuraHolder* holder = itr->second;
1695  if (func(holder))
1696  return true;
1697  }
1698  return false;
1699  }
1700 
1701  template<typename Func>
1702  bool HasAura(Func func, AuraType type) const
1703  {
1704  auto const& Auras = GetAurasByType(type);
1705  for (auto itr = Auras.begin(); itr != Auras.end(); ++itr)
1706  {
1707  if (func(*itr))
1708  return true;
1709  }
1710  return false;
1711  }
1712 
1713  virtual bool HasSpell(uint32 /*spellID*/) const { return false; }

1744  { return CastSpell(Victim, spellId, uint32(triggeredFlags), castItem, triggeredByAura, originalCaster, triggeredBy); }

1746  {

1748  }

1838  // Convenience checkers/getters/setters counterparts for some of the protected Unit guid fields
1839  // See the comments next to protected methods for meanings
1840  bool HasCharm(ObjectGuid const& exactGuid = ObjectGuid()) const { return (exactGuid.IsEmpty() ? GetCharmGuid().IsUnit() : (GetCharmGuid() == exactGuid)); }
1841  bool HasCharmer(ObjectGuid const& exactGuid) const { return exactGuid.IsUnit() && GetCharmerGuid().IsUnit() && GetCharmerGuid() == exactGuid; }
1842  bool HasCharmer() const { return GetCharmerGuid().IsUnit(); }
1843  bool HasMaster() const;
1844  bool HasTarget(ObjectGuid const& exactGuid = ObjectGuid()) const { return (exactGuid.IsEmpty() ? GetTargetGuid().IsUnit() : (GetTargetGuid() == exactGuid)); }
1845  bool HasChannelObject(ObjectGuid const& exactGuid = ObjectGuid()) const { return (exactGuid.IsEmpty() ? !(GetChannelObjectGuid().IsEmpty()) : (GetChannelObjectGuid() == exactGuid)); }

1848  Unit* GetCharmer(WorldObject const* pov = nullptr) const;
1849  Unit* GetCreator(WorldObject const* pov = nullptr) const;
1850  Unit* GetTarget(WorldObject const* pov = nullptr) const;
1851  WorldObject* GetChannelObject(WorldObject const* pov = nullptr) const;

1853  void SetCharm(Unit* charmed) { SetCharmGuid(charmed ? charmed->GetObjectGuid() : ObjectGuid()); }
1854  void SetCharmer(Unit* charmer) { SetCharmerGuid(charmer ? charmer->GetObjectGuid() : ObjectGuid()); }
1855  void SetTarget(WorldObject* target) { SetTargetGuid(target ? target->GetObjectGuid() : ObjectGuid()); }
1856  void SetChannelObject(WorldObject* object) { SetChannelObjectGuid(object ? object->GetObjectGuid() : ObjectGuid()); }
1857 
1858  // Purely logical guid constructs getters/setters
1859  // Owner: automatically resolves to creator guid and additionally to summoner guid
1860  ObjectGuid const& GetOwnerGuid() const override { return GetCreatorGuid(); }
1861  void SetOwnerGuid(ObjectGuid owner) override { SetCreatorGuid(owner); }
1862  // Pet: automatically resolves to summon guid (permanent pet)
1863  ObjectGuid const& GetPetGuid() const { return GetSummonGuid(); }
1864  void SetPetGuid(ObjectGuid pet) { SetSummonGuid(pet); }
1865  // Selection: by default resolves to target, overriden in Player
1866  virtual ObjectGuid const& GetSelectionGuid() const { return GetTargetGuid(); }
1867  virtual void SetSelectionGuid(ObjectGuid guid) { SetTargetGuid(guid); }
1868  // Master: automatically resolves to charmer or owner guid
1869  ObjectGuid const& GetMasterGuid() const { ObjectGuid const& guid = GetCharmerGuid(); return (guid ? guid : GetOwnerGuid()); }
1870

1964  float GetResistanceBuffMods(SpellSchools school, bool positive) const { return GetFloatValue(positive ? UNIT_FIELD_RESISTANCEBUFFMODSPOSITIVE + school : UNIT_FIELD_RESISTANCEBUFFMODSNEGATIVE + school); }
1965  void SetResistanceBuffMods(SpellSchools school, bool positive, float val) { SetFloatValue(positive ? UNIT_FIELD_RESISTANCEBUFFMODSPOSITIVE + school : UNIT_FIELD_RESISTANCEBUFFMODSNEGATIVE + school, val); }
1966  void ApplyResistanceBuffModsMod(SpellSchools school, bool positive, float val, bool apply) { ApplyModSignedFloatValue(positive ? UNIT_FIELD_RESISTANCEBUFFMODSPOSITIVE + school : UNIT_FIELD_RESISTANCEBUFFMODSNEGATIVE + school, val, apply); }
1967  void ApplyResistanceBuffModsPercentMod(SpellSchools school, bool positive, float val, bool apply) { ApplyPercentModFloatValue(positive ? UNIT_FIELD_RESISTANCEBUFFMODSPOSITIVE + school : UNIT_FIELD_RESISTANCEBUFFMODSNEGATIVE + school, val, apply); }
1968  void InitStatBuffMods()
1969  {
1970  for (int i = STAT_STRENGTH; i < MAX_STATS; ++i) SetFloatValue(UNIT_FIELD_POSSTAT0 + i, 0);
1971  for (int i = STAT_STRENGTH; i < MAX_STATS; ++i) SetFloatValue(UNIT_FIELD_NEGSTAT0 + i, 0);
1972  }
1973  void ApplyStatBuffMod(Stats stat, float val, bool apply) { ApplyModSignedFloatValue((val > 0 ? UNIT_FIELD_POSSTAT0 + stat : UNIT_FIELD_NEGSTAT0 + stat), val, apply); }
1974  void ApplyStatPercentBuffMod(Stats stat, float val, bool apply)
1975  {
1976  ApplyPercentModFloatValue(UNIT_FIELD_POSSTAT0 + stat, val, apply);
1977  ApplyPercentModFloatValue(UNIT_FIELD_NEGSTAT0 + stat, val, apply);
1978  }
1979  void SetCreateStat(Stats stat, float val) { m_createStats[stat] = val; }
1980  void SetCreateHealth(uint32 val) { SetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_BASE_HEALTH, val); }
1981  uint32 GetCreateHealth() const { return GetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_BASE_HEALTH); }
1982  void SetCreateMana(uint32 val) { SetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_BASE_MANA, val); }
1983  uint32 GetCreateMana() const { return GetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_BASE_MANA); }
1984  uint32 GetCreatePowers(Powers power) const;
1985  float GetPosStat(Stats stat) const { return GetFloatValue(UNIT_FIELD_POSSTAT0 + stat); }
1986  float GetNegStat(Stats stat) const { return GetFloatValue(UNIT_FIELD_NEGSTAT0 + stat); }
1987  float GetCreateStat(Stats stat) const { return m_createStats[stat]; }
1988  void SetCreateResistance(SpellSchools school, int32 val) { m_createResistances[school] = val; }
1989  int32 GetCreateResistance(SpellSchools school) const { return m_createResistances[school]; }

2018  bool IsInDisallowedMountForm() const
2019  {
2020  ShapeshiftForm form = GetShapeshiftForm();
2021  return form != FORM_NONE && form != FORM_BATTLESTANCE && form != FORM_BERSERKERSTANCE && form != FORM_DEFENSIVESTANCE &&
2022  form != FORM_SHADOW && form != FORM_STEALTH;
2023  }

2234  {

2236  return SPELL_AURA_PROC_OK;
2237  }
2238  SpellAuraProcResult HandleCantTrigger(ProcExecutionData& /*data*/)
2239  {
2240  // this aura type can't proc
2241  return SPELL_AURA_PROC_CANT_TRIGGER;

2272  bool HasHoverAura() const { return HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_HOVER); }
2273  template<typename Func>
2274  bool HasAuraWithCondition(Func const& func) const
2275  {
2276  Unit::SpellAuraHolderMap const& holders = GetSpellAuraHolderMap();
2277  for (const auto& holder : holders)
2278  {
2279  if (func(holder.second))
2280  {
2281  return true;
2282  }
2283  }
2284 
2285  return false;
2286  }

2586  void SetCharmerGuid(ObjectGuid const& owner) { SetGuidValue(UNIT_FIELD_CHARMEDBY, owner); }

2601  void SetChannelObjectGuid(ObjectGuid const& targetGuid) { SetGuidValue(UNIT_FIELD_CHANNEL_OBJECT, targetGuid); }

2697 
2698 template<typename Func>
2699 void Unit::CallForAllControlledUnits(Func const& func, uint32 controlledMask)
2700 {
2701  if (controlledMask & CONTROLLED_PET)
2702  if (Pet* pet = GetPet())
2703  func(pet);
2704 
2705  if (controlledMask & CONTROLLED_MINIPET)
2706  if (Pet* mini = GetMiniPet())
2707  func(mini);
2708 
2709  if (controlledMask & CONTROLLED_GUARDIANS)
2710  {
2711  for (m_guardianPetsIterator = m_guardianPets.begin(); m_guardianPetsIterator != m_guardianPets.end();)
2712  if (Pet* guardian = GetMap()->GetPet(*(m_guardianPetsIterator++)))
2713  func(guardian);
2714  }
2715 
2716  if (controlledMask & CONTROLLED_TOTEMS)
2717  {
2718  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_TOTEM_SLOT; ++i)
2719  if (Unit* totem = _GetTotem(TotemSlot(i)))
2720  func(totem);
2721  }
2722 
2723  if (controlledMask & CONTROLLED_CHARM)
2724  {
2725  if (Unit* charm = GetCharm())
2726  func(charm);
2727 
2728  for (GuidSet::const_iterator itr = m_charmedUnitsPrivate.begin(); itr != m_charmedUnitsPrivate.end();)
2729  if (Unit* charmed = _GetUnit(*(itr++)))
2730  func(charmed);
2731  }
2732 }
2733 
2734 
2735 template<typename Func>
2736 bool Unit::CheckAllControlledUnits(Func const& func, uint32 controlledMask) const
2737 {
2738  if (controlledMask & CONTROLLED_PET)
2739  if (Pet const* pet = GetPet())
2740  if (func(pet))
2741  return true;
2742 
2743  if (controlledMask & CONTROLLED_MINIPET)
2744  if (Pet* mini = GetMiniPet())
2745  if (func(mini))
2746  return true;
2747 
2748  if (controlledMask & CONTROLLED_GUARDIANS)
2749  {
2750  for (auto m_guardianPet : m_guardianPets)
2751  if (Pet* guardian = GetMap()->GetPet(m_guardianPet))
2752  if (func(guardian))
2753  return true;
2754  }
2755 
2756  if (controlledMask & CONTROLLED_TOTEMS)
2757  {
2758  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_TOTEM_SLOT; ++i)
2759  if (Unit const* totem = _GetTotem(TotemSlot(i)))
2760  if (func(totem))
2761  return true;
2762  }
2763 
2764  if (controlledMask & CONTROLLED_CHARM)
2765  {
2766  if (Unit const* charm = GetCharm())
2767  if (func(charm))
2768  return true;
2769 
2770  for (GuidSet::const_iterator itr = m_charmedUnitsPrivate.begin(); itr != m_charmedUnitsPrivate.end();)
2771  if (Unit const* charmed = _GetUnit(*(itr++)))
2772  if (func(charmed))
2773  return true;
2774  }
2775 
2776  return false;
2777 }
2778 
2779 // Helper for targets nearest to the spell target
2780 // The spell target is always first unless there is a target at _completely_ the same position (unbelievable case)
2781 struct TargetDistanceOrderNear
2782 {
2783  WorldObject const* m_mainTarget;
2784  DistanceCalculation m_distcalc;
2785 
2786  TargetDistanceOrderNear(WorldObject const* target, DistanceCalculation distcalc = DIST_CALC_NONE) : m_mainTarget(target), m_distcalc(distcalc) {}
2787  // functor for operator ">"
2788  bool operator()(WorldObject const* _Left, WorldObject const* _Right) const
2789  {
2790  return m_mainTarget->GetDistanceOrder(_Left, _Right, m_distcalc);
2791  }
2792 };
2793 
2794 // Helper for targets furthest away to the spell target
2795 // The spell target is always first unless there is a target at _completely_ the same position (unbelievable case)
2796 struct TargetDistanceOrderFarAway
2797 {
2798  WorldObject const* m_mainTarget;
2799  DistanceCalculation m_distcalc;
2800  TargetDistanceOrderFarAway(WorldObject const* target, DistanceCalculation distcalc = DIST_CALC_NONE) : m_mainTarget(target), m_distcalc(distcalc) {}
2801  // functor for operator "<"
2802  bool operator()(WorldObject const* _Left, WorldObject const* _Right) const
2803  {
2804  return !m_mainTarget->GetDistanceOrder(_Left, _Right, m_distcalc);
2805  }
2806 };
2807 
2808 struct LowestHPNearestOrder
2809 {
2810  WorldObject const* m_mainTarget;
2811  DistanceCalculation m_distcalc;
2812 
2813  LowestHPNearestOrder(WorldObject const* target, DistanceCalculation distcalc = DIST_CALC_NONE) : m_mainTarget(target), m_distcalc(distcalc) {}
2814  // functor for operator ">"
2815  bool operator()(Unit const* _Left, Unit const* _Right) const
2816  {
2817  if (_Left->GetHealthPercent() == _Right->GetHealthPercent())
2818  return m_mainTarget->GetDistanceOrder(_Left, _Right, m_distcalc);
2819  return _Left->GetHealthPercent() < _Right->GetHealthPercent();
2820  }
2821 };
2822 
2823 class UnitLambdaEvent : public BasicEvent
2824 {
2825  public:
2826  UnitLambdaEvent(Unit& owner, std::function<void(Unit&)> const& func) : m_owner(owner), m_func(func) {}
2827 
2828  virtual bool Execute(uint64 /*e_time*/, uint32 /*p_time*/)
2829  {
2830  m_func(m_owner);
2831  return true;
2832  }
2833 
2834  Unit& m_owner;
2835  std::function<void(Unit&)> m_func;
2836 };
2837
